website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for the foundation for the ultimate hamster paradise, this cage kit includes tons of engaging activities, and it’s fun to build upon it with more add-ons.
pros: Includes exercise wheel, food bowl, private den, water bottle, ramps, and tubes
cons: A little pricy, but this cage comes with quite a lot

customer_reviews.title: Beware: has an extra exit on the left side
customer_reviews.text: We love this cage and our hamster is happy. However, the cage has TWO side exits through the wire section (unlike the one that is shown in the picture), and the cage only came with one side cap (it also has a cap at the very top). We have covered it with a plastic lid for the moment, and are keeping it because the rest of the cage is so great, but others should be aware of this rather important defect. We are writing amazon in hopes that they will send us another cover like that on the other side of the cage, and will update with further information depending upon their response.
customer_reviews.author: JA-G

customer_reviews.title: My hamster is super happy in this habitat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for her and she is very happy in it!!! It was easy set up and i love that everything is included!! Its so much fun to see her go on her little adventures! I would recommend this habitat for any pet parent looking to make there hamster very happy! I added the second hiding spot at the bottom just because she likes to dig into the bedding when she goes to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters love it
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Great hamster cage. Not very to hard to put together. Very sturdy. Would definitely recommend. I put this cage on top of a 40 gallon tank. It’s the best of 2 cages put together. I double love this set up. More importantly my hamsters love it. It’s safe secure and looks awesome. ❤️ Just need to order more tubes so hamsters can get to top level on their own. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: JLTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The hamster can easily fit through
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cover for the top section is creating too big of a gap on the sides of the cage. The hamster can easily fit through. I checked to make sure its properly closing and it is but the plastic dosent fill the gap completely so I have to tape it. The hamster wheel is extremely loud so I had to buy another and put my own in the downstairs section. Cage is okay generally.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: chemical warning
customer_reviews.text: haven't even opened it yet. how had nobody else noticed this warning sticker that is saying this product releases chemicals into the air that cause cancer and reproductive harm?? that was no where in the description of this product. very disappointed. definitely dont want this cage around me or my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christinaamber

customer_reviews.title: Impossible!
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to assemble! I just spent 2 hours trying to insert the “screws and nuts” to attach top to bottom. I have assembled many things in my life, including furniture, and this is the first thing I have given up on. I was looking forward to giving my little dwarf hamster something fun to play on, but I will use my refund to just buy her a bigger regular cage. More power to you if you can get this together! Personally, my advice is to forget this one.
customer_reviews.author: DeeD

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this cage a week and the wheel broke off the first day. We moved the bed over to cover the hole it left. This morning the pegs on the bed were broken off and the pegs on the green ledges were broken and cracked. We were super excited when it came in but it has been a complete waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3

customer_reviews.title: Poor air circulation
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking cage and sturdy, but the vertical section was very poorly thought through. There is very little air circulation, so after just 24 hours the cage starts to smell strongly of ammonia, and then so does the room. I only have one white mouse, I should not have to clean the upper section daily. I've tried odor neutralizing spray, and charcoal bags to absorb the smell but they don't help at all. Also, if you have a small mouse, it can get between the bars where the door latches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique Perspective into Hamster Life
customer_reviews.text: Labyrinth provides a unique perspective into a hamsters life, much like a flat ant farm. Our hamster nests in the labyrinth, we can watch her tend to her baby through the clear panel, she rearranges her nest and food stash spots frequently; moving her piles of bedding around the labyrinth as if rearranging her furniture. The wheel is silent, bonus points for that. Only suggestion is to make the labyrinth detach easily from cage to make cleaning easier. When we open the labyrinth panel, the bedding falls out uncontrolled (This occurs because our hamster hauls all her bedding up the tube and into the labyrinth). Overall a great product providing a personal and entertaining view into our critter's life.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.C

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for Syrian hamsters, tube attraction also too narrow; hardware tricky
customer_reviews.text: The mfgr's customer service couldn't have been nicer, but we could not get past the very tight and tricky assembly hardware. Also, we learned that Syrian hamsters need width, not height, so this was a no-go: too narrow. Plus, if you are attracted to the tube attachment feature (which we were since we have a tube system), this is also a no-go for anything besides Rovo's and mice or other very small rodents. CUTE concept, but it's not appropriate for all breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these cages and absolutely love them. Cleaning them is so easy and I love the top portion. It gives our little hamsters an area to play and climb. They love the depth of the little house and we will it with bedding so they can really burrow down deep. Everything is wonderful quality and I had very little issue getting it together.
customer_reviews.author: AZak8270

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I caught two house mice thought this would contain them. The bars in the bottom part are too wide and they squeezed through in 2 seconds. After spending two hours recapturing them, I closed off the top part and kept them in there. The next morning I returned to find just one. The other had gnawed her way out. I fortunately was able to recapture her, but this cage is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Janne

customer_reviews.title: My mice love this cage
customer_reviews.text: In the past few years, I've had several mice and so I ordered this cage model multiple times. Pros: + all my mice loved it, it's a perfect home for them + very spacious, like a mansion for them + the wheel will keep the mice active + it's a versatile design, you can easily connect two of those cages using tubes Cons: - assembling it for the first time is a little bit difficult !!! WARNING - my female mice could escape through the main entrance - hence I had to cover that area with a plate. This is a cage for hamsters though, so as hamsters are a bit bigger than mice, this wouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriu Schneider

customer_reviews.title: best habitat ever for my hamster!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space, expansions holes, great quality. only few improvements i did are: 1. i wrapped metal cage with extra metal grid so when my hamster digs&moves bedding around it woun't end up outside the cage. 2. i connected top of the cage to the bottom part with metal instead of plastic bits which i suspect can be chewed by hamster leading to a disconnection of those 2 parts. all these improvements arent a big problem and i will buy this habitat again should I need one. recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage
customer_reviews.text: We've had 3 cages from different manufacturers and this one is hands-down the best. Great for hammies and mice. It felt a tiny bit small for a full-sized adult Syrian hammie, but not terribly so with extra tubing space and perfect for dwarf hammies or mice. Only negative is we did have several of the "shelf" tabs snap off after repeat disassembly/reassembly cleanings, but thus far still at least two tabs remain on each shelf so they're still usable. Would be awesome if there were replacement shelves we could 3d print.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My chunky hamster loves it 😁 ive had his cage for a while now, everything is great! The putting together part was a little difficult, but the result is worth it. Im just happy he has alot of space to run and play now. I also love being able to take off the clear plastic part without a struggle, it makes cleaning and holding my hamster so easy :). Only con about it is i feel if i was to drop the clear plastic, itd break on me. So i guess its a matter of just being really careful.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gerbil Home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage for my sons two gerbils. It has a cool design and the gerbils love it. He loves that it has the clear cover over the front where the wheel is so he can watch his gerbils do their thing. Be careful if your child is opening the top clear cover because if they drop it it will eventually crack. Ours did crack and I contacted the company and they had me show them proof of the crack and proof of purchase and they sent me a new cover free of charge. Would defiantly recommend this to others and would repurchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Our pet mouse escaped from this cage.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cage hoping to give our little field mouse a better home then a simple tank he was in before but unfortunately he escaped some how. I know it's meant for hamsters but I read some reviews from people that they used it on their mice as well without issues. Just a warning that mice can escape from it. If we can catch our mouse that I'm assuming is now loose in the house we will buy some plexy glass to rig around the wire part and drill tiny holes for air. Overall the cage seems very nice for any small rodent just make sure they aren't too small for the cage.
customer_reviews.author: clevans

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a PAIN to attach the black pegs
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cage with lots of space but it was a PAIN to attach the black pegs. My advice would be: put the plack peg through the plastic side and then pull it back and push it through the nut until it clicks. It was absolutely impossible to do if you try to push the nut directly into the peg. They need to be attached at the same time. We only got three pegs to work and didn't worry about the fourth since it was stable enough without it. Everything else was simple to put together after that point.
customer_reviews.author: KRB

customer_reviews.title: Great cage highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about a month for our chunky teddy bear hampster.., Love the design and it’s easy to clean.... good size and way better than I expected. Some of the reviews had me hesitant but I’m glad I ordered it. I will get another cage to add to it so he has more room eventually. But he’s happy and really loves the hanging box/bed. And I had room to put a litter box under his wheel that he uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jean

customer_reviews.title: Hamster broke spine and died after falling off ladder on top level
customer_reviews.text: My dwarf hamster fell off the top level onto the second level and broke her spine. She passed away less than 24 hours later after being in ICU. Worst traumatic thing my family has ever experienced. The ladders are not wide enough to protect the hamsters from falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: A little awkward to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a robo dwarf hamster, and he really seems to like this cage. It gives him plenty of room to run while also letting you be able to see him while he's walking around up top. My biggest complaints would be that you can't exchange the wheel (because it's attached to the wall) and it's a little inconvenient to clean. I end up having to take the entire top part off, which means the hamster has to go in his hamster ball, to clean it fully. The wheel is pretty quiet, so that's good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jeans

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the platform design
customer_reviews.text: Great, unique design...large area on bottom part....clear cover on top part is great for viewing hamster’s antics, tube is larger than kaytee tubes which is good for larger hamsters. However, the pegs on one of the green platforms broke after only a couple weeks rendering it unusable. I only removed the platform twice for cleaning, and I was not rough. Knocked off a star for flimsy design of platform.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dobosz

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I'm not a pet person. My son saw this product on a YouTube show and wanted it for his hamster. After reading the reviews here, I was weary because quite honestly, his hamster is pretty fat. Oh the horror if the furry guy got stuck in a tube! But 2 weeks in and so far so good. I will say the wheel could be bigger, along with the panel angle that covers it. REALLY TIGHT. For that, it loses a star in my circumstance. Still, decent product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for a dwarf hamster or mouse, bit small for normal hamster or rat
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing if you are realistic and get it for the right critter, that's all that really needs to be said. Fantastic buy for the price but is not roomy enough for a normal size hamster.. get a 20gal long fish tank at petsmart or petco when they have the $1 per gallon promo for a full size hamster but for a dwarf this is the best bang for your buck by far!!!
customer_reviews.author: brian kelly

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, can't use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a nice cage, but I am not even going to bother putting it together because the first piece I unpacked had a shattered corner and it can't be use like this. Nor am I going to let my hamster in this cage if it can get out or possibly get hurt if I were to tape or glue it together (which would look stupid anyway). Now I have to wait for a replacement in hopes that it doesn't come in worse condition than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love our Hamster Penthouse!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamster habitat so much! My kids have a Russian Dwarf hamster, so he’s half the size of a regular hamster. I was a little afraid he would be able to squeeze out of the cage bars. But, so far so good! The cage was relatively easy to put together, minus a little trouble with the plastic snap screws that came with it. The enclosure is roomy and our hamster seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: DrDD

customer_reviews.title: LOUD squeaky wheel!
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is very loud and squeaky, and it’s hard to get the hamster out if they are in the upper portion. Not very practical of a cage. My hamster ended up giving birth in this cage and although she liked the cozy nest it was very disruptive to get all the babies out once they were old enough to be handled. The bedding fell out everywhere once we took the front glass off. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Not for Dwarf
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the cages I looked at this was my top pick. Got it put together relatively quick. The top plastic exterior piece gaps a little on the sides. I personally have a dwarf hamster and this cage is not suitable. The escape artist has gotten out multiple times. This might be the perfect setup for a larger hamster but not sure it would withstand a larger breed. The green floors on the upper level don’t snap all the way in and slant downward on the outermost side.
customer_reviews.author: BMR2009

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: I've put together some complicated items over my years of online ordering but this one almost got put back in the box & returned. I'll try this out but am not confident that the hamster we get won't chew through the plastic pieces. I think it's a cool concept & will allow for the little a lot of hiding spots but my main gripe is putting it together. Almost impossible & not all the plastic nuts fit properly to fasten the top part to the bottom. I won't order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supercute, some tight spots for Syrian
customer_reviews.text: Supercute, initially had some difficulty applying the 3rd and 4th little nut to plastic bolt, switched my hands and went on effortlessly-- go figure😊. My large syrian hamster was able to squeeze onto wheel, but tight fit...I might replace with a slightly smaller wheel. Other wise, the space is fine for her. I'm going to keep an eye on her when in use for now.
customer_reviews.author: niecypoo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great home for Dwarf Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage, it is a good size and fun to watch the hamster in. The only downside is cleaning to top section. The way it is attached to the bottom makes it difficult to simply remove and clean, so you need to remove the hamsters, take the black cage portion with the top attached and then clean the top with the cage piece attached. The bottom section is very easy to clean. The hamster love the top so you need to clean that more frequently than the bottom, but it is still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great buy
customer_reviews.text: For my hamster this was a huge upgrade from what I had and now I can c her more she exercises more and is just a happy big girl
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: He love this so much. Perfect home for my hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Qi Su

customer_reviews.title: Stay away - killed my pets
customer_reviews.text: Had many problems: green shelves broke easily, gate gap is big enough that drawf hamsters escape, wheel is not ideal location to use for my pets.... but the worst of it all is the cage metal has toxic paint or content that poisıned my pets and killed them when they chewed on them 😰🤯
customer_reviews.author: CCAN

customer_reviews.title: I love this cage
customer_reviews.text: We have a fairly large hamster and he was able to maneuver and explore easily his new home. The only difficult part of putting this together was when attaching the upright section to the top of the cage. Yes, we got a little frustrated before we figured it out (two people, two tools and a little force). But past that, this was easy to assemble. My three year old loves watching our hamster make his way up and around the top section and run on the wheel. Overall I'm happy with this purchase, although I can't speak to the longevity as we just got it today.
customer_reviews.author: VickySue

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming cage.
customer_reviews.text: This cage looks cool, take up less space, and the hamster liked it....but OMG it took a very long time to clean it out. The tube that comes with it also fell off easily, and I ordered extra tubing and it did not fit. After frustration trying to connect the new tubing, I threw it in the trash! I ended up after a few months ordering a different cage that is much much easier to access and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Horne

customer_reviews.title: Broken and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two. One had a missing piece that closes the top (but it worked out ok), and the other had a ladder piece too small to be usable plus it was cracked. Also if you have both of the fasteners in place at the top, the wheel doesn’t really turn so we can only put one fastener at the top. The kids love the design and being able to really see their hamsters and it’s easy to clean, but quality control could stand improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Molly A. Conner

customer_reviews.title: A pain in the butt to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I took me 2 hours to put it together. Over one hour to pop the screws and bolts together. My fingers hurt very bad. Good news is that once you get past getting the top portion secured, you blow threw assembly. My baby hamsters love their new (temp) home and started exploring right away. I can't wait till they're big enough to reach the wheel and platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Axdann

customer_reviews.title: Small pets can squeeze through wire.
customer_reviews.text: We bought our 8 year old a dwarf hamster for Christmas. Imagine our surprise when we woke up to find no hamster in the cage. The gaps of the wire are large enough for small hamsters or mice to squeeze through.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Would probably just pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Day 2 of having this cage 😭 I was so excited about it too. One of my gerbils even ran on the wheel, and they've never wanted anything to do with wheels before. I'm pretty sad about this, because now they can't access they're second level. I give them plenty else to chew on, but they still completely devoured this in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennaj

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cage, my hamster was a little hesitant to walk on the clear plastic to get around and onto her wheel, but after I set some bedding down on it, she was completely fine. I put a light on the very top of the cage and it lights up the entire top half during the night, which makes it look very cool. Definetly a cage I’ll be keeping ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Check for flex which may lead to an escape!
customer_reviews.text: We like this cage very much for our dwarf hamster. There is one big problem though. The clear plastic that covers the front of the top of the cage flexes too much on the left side and our hamster was able to squeeze through and escape. Thankfully we found her. From now on I have to put a piece of tape over that side to keep it fully closed.
customer_reviews.author: melbatoast

customer_reviews.title: hamster gage
customer_reviews.text: got an unexpected critter and had to get a home for it. Snowball now lives in the Critterville cage and as far as I can tell is very happy with it. She seems to only like the bottom half of the bed, though. he cage is easy to clean and allows for enough air to get into it. I find that the tube wold be better suited if it were more to one side rather than in the middles.
customer_reviews.author: SHERI

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: bigger putting 4 little black snaps for cage to plastic holding it together.. snap was excruciatingly tight. 4 stars .. rest was easy.. time consuming.. 9 yr old put together w very little assist. seems sturdy.. 50 bucks for a rat house.. as pictured..lol.. kids happy..hamster is super confused.. was a gift for chores completed..thanks
customer_reviews.author: shoppers critique

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My poor hamster got stuck between the wheel and the plastic while I was at work and passed away. I was absolutely stunned! As an experienced animal owner I am disappointed that the design would allow this to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit for wheel
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about it except the wheel is really close to the glass so its a squeeze for my teddy bear hamster to get in, and he doesnt use the clear bridges because hes tall enough to climb with out them. I wouls recommend this to dwarf hamsters and rodents of that size. He seems to like it but the sqeeze makes me worry. The wheel though is perfect size. He doesnt like the home it came with, but thats not the sellers problem its just my picky Salem. Anywho 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Leann

customer_reviews.title: Some parts are hard or impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to attach the white part to the wire part. We are still working on it. Hope we can get it attached by Sunday because that’s when we are planning to get my daughter a hamster. I got two snapped it’s been hrs and I’ve taken a break and taking turns because it’s frustrating and our fingers hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: I agree with someone else about it being very cheap plastic, I fear if I accidentally drop the clear cover it will break and one wrong move with these tubes and they be toast too. For almost 50$ you would think it would be a bit better... I dont anticipate this lasting her whole life. And I also had one of my black knubs that just would not attach like someone else said. So she only has 3 pieces holding it together instead of 4. And adding other tubes to this thing is horrible and seriously complicated...
customer_reviews.author: domari

customer_reviews.title: Not for hamsters!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage for my 2 female mice and they are very happy with it! That being said however I can’t imagine a hamster would enjoy living in such a small space. Hamsters need a LOT more space than this cage. My mice are chillin tho bc theyre much smaller than hamsters and require much less space.
customer_reviews.author: MissKitty75

customer_reviews.title: Be very very careful putting together
customer_reviews.text: All of the green runway ramp connecting points completely broke off one ramp when we installed it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Well-made, <3 Midwest Products, but small
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my son and he(and I) loves it. My only "complaint" is it's a bit small, just shy of 300 sq. in. ground space. My answer to this since I love the product was to add a tank it for more space. I bought a 20 gallon aquarium and with the help of duct tape and wire cloth made a lid. (pictured) ~Midwest please produce more hamster products. I will buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a cool cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dwarf hamster and I love it. Putting it together was kind of a pain in the butt and the only real two complaints I have are about the wheel and the ladders. Wheel was super loud and it was a little too big for my hamster so I replaced it with a smaller wheel. She also was completely unable to climb up the ladders to the levels, she kept sliding down so I put some hot glue on the grooves and now she goes up and down with ease. Plenty of room to roam and places to play. She seems happy so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Gerbils Will Destroy the Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Hamsters and gerbils will eat through al the plastic in no time. I love the design and it is easy to clean - but now it is trash as the gerbils have completely chewed up the wheel, food bowl and blue tube connectors in less than 1 month. Buyer beware! Also, I did clean it one a week and made sure they had food daily - so that was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to other hamster owners
customer_reviews.text: This was for my boyfriends syrian and the hamster really enjoys it and the wheel is much bigger and better than her orginal. However, we have to clean the top of it almost every 2 days because she has learned she can pull her nedding up to the top shelf and make herself a little nest and never be found. All in all though a really cool cage we were able to connect with her old one
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not for our Hamster
customer_reviews.text: This cage is cute but not good for my hamster. Hamsters usually use one corner of cage to pee in, not this cage!! She would pee all over the top part, I had to add shavings up there to soak up the pee, she never came to the bottom, just to take a drink of water. Hardly ever used the wheel... it's like the cage changed her. So, I put her back in her aquarium cage, she is back to normal!! Peeing in one corner, easy clean up!! Also, she is social again and always on the wheel. The cage may work for some ppls hamster, but not ours!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rider

customer_reviews.title: CAGE KILLS MY HAMSTER!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS HAMSTER CAGE! WITHIN ONE DAY MY HAMSTER WAS TRAPPED BETWEEN THE WHEEL AND THE SIDE OF THE CAGE AND THE WHEEL SQUISHED HIS HEAD FLAT AND KILLED HIM! Absolutely terrible way to die for any animal. My family is completely distraught! We can’t believe we lost our hamster just trying to give him a better home! DO NOT BUY THIS! YOUR HAMSTER WILL DIE!
customer_reviews.author: matthew burns

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamster Cage (for you and your hamster)
customer_reviews.text: Love this setup for our hamster. It has plenty of room to explore and it’s easy to watch and enjoy her activity. Tube holes on the side and top give great places for adding additional activity and places to explore. SO EASY to clean. Top and bottom can be sectioned off with tube cap during cleaning or quick and easy cleaning while she’s exercising in her ball. Top part has two very sturdy but easy sliding clips to remove front plate to clean. Bottom also has just two clips that are very sturdy but easy to clip for full access to bottom half. We’ve been very happy with it and our hamster is too.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Great home for our hamster!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great habitat for our hamster. It is compact yet provides great space for our hamster! She is quite happy exploring her way through the tubes and she loves the cubby space up top! It is a great all in one product and we definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Ummm my pet escaped says enough
customer_reviews.text: The idea of the product is cute however assembling it together was a challenge. Also the pieces aren’t sturdy and do stay I had to super glue them to stay in place and not to mention it’s a huge hole on the side of the cage that allows my daughters pet to escape of which he did like 3 times so I had to block the whole. Cute idea of this product but execution isn’t the greatest. Wouldn’t recommend this until they update their product.
customer_reviews.author: Mkupartistamber

customer_reviews.title: A okay cage
customer_reviews.text: Had this cage for a few weeks now. Water bottle dosent work for pet. The tube size is big and just a FYI critter brand to small for this cage. Not sure what tubes fit correct? Was pretty easy to assemble and cleaning isn't to bad. Hope this helps some.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: very well built and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: the only weakness is the push pins that hold the upper plastic cage together with the mesh grill bottom, spent a good 10 mins press these knuckle heads in place. other than that, it has everything just as the picture and description says, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Yigang Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter and her hamster Love this new home. There is no way to get bored with all the activities available. The clear plastic activity area makes it easy to watch her hamster enjoy all the fun. Well worth the price to see my grand-daughter so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke right out of the box. Even so, the clips that are used are impossible to assemble the arcade with the cage. Save the box it came in to ship it back in!
customer_reviews.author: Verified

customer_reviews.title: Looks neat but is impractical.
customer_reviews.text: A real pain when it's time to clean. Practically impossible to handle your hamster with this cage, if you like holding and petting, this thing isn't for you. It is made well and is neat looking. Makes it easy to watch your animal.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hissom

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...
customer_reviews.text: My hamster was climbing on the wheel and got stuck (choked). The plastic is too close to the wheel on the right side. Now we do not have a hamster and I'm not sure that I would want to chance the cage with another one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Love that everything is clear.  Sturdy.  No broken pieces.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made the decision to purchase this cage. I loved that it was clear. I was worried after reading reviews, but I was 100% satisfied. Hamster seems too love his house too. I put it together with no help from my husband, and everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cage and put hamster seems so enjoy it. It was pretty simple to put together. I’m not confident to clips on top that opens and closes the clear plastic wall will last, I feel as if we can’t complaine about quality for the price. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: HallFamBam!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little cage. They thought of everything. It was easy to put together. Each section is well thought out and easy for our hamster to get to. Everything is easily accessible for cleaning or rearranging. The colors are cute. I love that it has attachments for tubes. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle ayers

customer_reviews.title: Our hammy loves this and we love to watch him!
customer_reviews.text: Our hammy loves this habitat. He had a small cage before this and he pretty much slept all day and night. He seemed depressed. The first night he spent in his new home he was up all night, swinging around his cage and checking it all out. It is so fun to watch him. The only reason I gave this a four is because he busted out of it!! So now I use a rubber band to secure the cage door.
customer_reviews.author: Kmnp

customer_reviews.title: Dwarf hamster owners be aware.
customer_reviews.text: This cage was easy to assemble except for attaching the upper part to the cage the pieces used to it attach it did not fit on one side I bought two cages and neither one of them worked on one of the sides. Also we have a Dwarf hamster and the first night she was able to escape the cage by climbing through the door that leads into the metal cage at the top where there is a pretty big gap therefore we had to put cardboard over the top so she can’t get out .
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HARD TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: it’s a cute cage but only big enough to fit one syrian hamster. The cage is very hard to clean as you have to completely dismantle it to clean it. The ramps detach and my hamster had a tendency to knock them off making them basically useless, the wheel is loud when you first get it but it is easily fixed by vasiline. It’s a cute cage but not worth it for how long it takes to clean. when i ordered it the front piece was broken and we had to order a whole new cage to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t SUPER easy to assemble. I had a lot of difficulty getting the pins in but once it was in we were ready to rock! VERY VERY VERY EASY TO CLEAN! All the other cages I had before took forever! This only takes 10-15 minutes tops!
customer_reviews.author: Lins13Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Lotta work.
customer_reviews.text: My likes: my hamster is more active and is not ingesting plastic anymore. My dislikes: the amount of time (1.5 hrs) to put together because of one piece would no go through. Lastly, how easy it was for my hamster to get out of cage. (Have to padlock it) this is why 4 stars. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Stuie

customer_reviews.title: the plastic top retains the hamster smell
customer_reviews.text: weve had this cage for 6 months nkw and it was great at first but the plastic top has absorbed the smell. my daughter cleans it 1x a week and washes it with soap and water and we cant get the smell out. we will be getting a new one with no plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M Wood

customer_reviews.title: Small Robo Hampster escapes through bars.
customer_reviews.text: NOT for ROBOs!! Our little robo hampster escaped And I blamed my son. Then she escaped again and I realized she was squeezing through the bars because there is no other place to escape. So if you have a very tiny hamster this is not the right cage
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My hampster loves this especially the green hide at the top! Although I dont know if my baby is a little crazier than others but she loves to pee and poop up top part witch means I have to clean it at least 2-3 times a week the bottom part unclips and emptys pretty easily all in all I think that if I ever need to buy a new home for one of my babies I'd get this one again oh my baby is a classroom pet so this cage is perfect for the small space I have free
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Small hamster may escape!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute product. I have noticed the hamster wheel is quite loud at night. Also our hamster escaped between the door on top his third or fourth night in. It was quite a morning trying to locate a hamster before work in school... Now we set up a book on top of the door to keep her from escaping.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wanko

customer_reviews.title: Best hamster Christmas ever!
customer_reviews.text: It was my first Christmas with my hamster and I wanted to make it special for her and this cage really did it, it’s so much better then her traditional cage she absolutely loved it! It made my day seeing her so happy. It’s an Amazing cage!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very open design, great for watching your hamster
customer_reviews.text: I love the layout of this cage because I can see everything my hamster does, however I have a white winter dwarf hamster and she found it extremely difficult to get up the ramps without sliding back down and it isn't possible to move the wheel to a lower level for her because of how the cage is designed. Maybe she will get the hang of it someday, but for now she hasn't made it past that first level.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good observational cage, but would rethink some things
customer_reviews.text: Good product however the hit where the hamster sleeps has to be changed just as often as the bottom there for small plastic piece broke is still hangs up but barely. It is a good idea to have the clear view and all but just remember the poop is everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice cage with one draw back
customer_reviews.text: this cage came as described. It was a little frustrating to put together but instructions we better than most. The top section does not come off easily for cleaning. They make a mess up top and does require very frequent cleaning. but if you understand that, then this is a wonderful well built cage,
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but kind of small for a Syrian. Not sure if my Syrian is abnormally huge, but she has to squeeze herself to the top and can’t comfortably run in the wheel. If you have a dwarf or a new Syrian that’s still young this would be fine. I only use it for traveling so she does not use this everyday to live in.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda

customer_reviews.title: For a big hamster
customer_reviews.text: This cage itself is great easy to assemble but this is not a good cage for a dwarf hamster the hamster had a hard time getting into the top part. The space between the wires are a little wider than some other cages our hamster got out of this cage on 3 different occasions. I would recommend this cage for a bigger hamster.
customer_reviews.author: ladybuglee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cage.
customer_reviews.text: This cage took a bit of time to put together but wants difficult at all. Looks really nice and seems pretty sturdy. Hamster seems to like it and has no problem going to the upper area.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat!
customer_reviews.text: This hamster habitat is really great. It provides great options for movement and hamster fun. It allows for better interaction with your hamster than the popular pet store sold habitats. Our hamster escaped a few times from those but not this one. The hamster seems to enjoy this habitat more too. The reason I took off one star is due to one of the green level attachments broke easily. I wish there were extra parts available and for more configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Super Cool, Not the Best Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this cage and the functionality of it. It would have been really easy to assemble and easily been 5 stars if the pieces had been higher quality. One of the metal pieces of the cage was disconnected, so it made the cover piece not fit right. The top didn’t fit exactly because of similar issues which causes the whole top to fit kind of weird and leaving me to tape the clear plastic piece down. It’s an inconvenience, but I still like the cage. People find it very cool when they see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cage is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster got this cage for Christmas! It is so cool. He has so much space to crawl around and the kids love watching him. It didn't take me too long to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Bell

customer_reviews.title: It may hurt your hamster.
customer_reviews.text: Quite small cage, just barely enough for Robo hamsters. The idea of plastic tower is very good though but the position of the spinning wheel is too high. Hamsters frequently fall from the wheel to the bottom of the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Jabberwky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an easy alternative to one of my critter nation cages. I own two southern flying squirrels and they seem to love this play pen. The food bowl and separate water is quite nice also. Greatly appreciated the ease of assembly and how well it is made.
customer_reviews.author: TheGrayOne

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this cage! The only problem my dwarf hamster seems to have is on the upper level trying to get to the wheel. Since the landing is clear she seems like she is unsure of if she can walk across or not. & the little ladders going up she seems to have a hard time figuring those out. I got glued little carpet strips to them & she no longer has problems! I think the clear throws her off!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters love it.
customer_reviews.text: We rescued several hamsters that someone had just thrown in the dumpster. I wish the opening on the base was easier to open, but it is very good. The hamsters love the top the most. I recommend it for your little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Lmchays

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cage.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would! Worst hamster cage ever. My hamster escaped so easily. NOT for a dwarf hamster. Then the ramps up to the bed and wheel are too slippery for him to use. We made little wood stairs to help him, but I shouldn't have had to do that. Buy a different cage and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade from out little starter cage. Definitely a good amount for space for our small Russian Hamster. Wouldnt recommend for anything bigger. Instructions for assembly were very easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Sarheaa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CAGE!!!! MUST BUY FOR HAMSTERS
customer_reviews.text: thank you so much for this amazing cage!! i felt his old one was too small and he just loves this one. he was hesitant to go up at first, as he was with his first cage, but he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to clean. Took me several hours to assemble. Fell apart in less than a year. It's super easy for a hamster to escape. Save some money and just use a fish tank
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Part of my hamster's mansion.
customer_reviews.text: My hamster's second home (this one) is where he spends most of his time now. It originally was an addition to his first home, but now it's a stand alone, as is his first home, and they both sit inside his playpen mansion. My hamster's holdings are growing! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I like this cage but also hate it all in one... I feel like it's hard to clean because when they pee on the top part it's hard to clean.. and If you wanna take them out the cage when there in the top level all the stuff in the top comes out and spills kinda annoying honestly would recommend getting a 20 gallon tank and buy things to put into the cage over having this cage..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good running around space for dwarf/robo hamsters
customer_reviews.text: My dwarf hamster loves it's new home. At first it was unsure about the top portion, but now it loves to climb around it. (I had to lure it up there with a trail of food. LOL) The wheel up top is designed however for bigger hamsters, just something to keep in mind. The assembly was difficult at first. Especially attaching the top to the wire cage. Had to have my dad help push the pins in. The rest was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr and still loving this for our dwarf.
customer_reviews.text: 1 yr and still loving this cage to this day for our dwarf. Easy to take a apart and wash and dry. Just leave the grate on the back when washing as not to strip the locks.
customer_reviews.author: Shops too much

product_meta.title: Midwest Critterville Arcade Hamster Cage
product_meta.description: Size:18.1 x 13.25 x 10.75Who says hamsters or gerbils are just a pet for kids? We would like to challenge that notion and that's why we are introducing our Critterville Arcade Hamster Home! This cool cage comes with a multi-level living & play space so you can watch your hamster in action & keep up with their daily routine. Each Arcade Hamster Home comes equipped with an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook & interior play tubes. The Arcade features a deep plastic base to contain litter, a convenient top door & a removable cover for easy cleaning & interaction with your hamster. This cage also includes a side "port" & connectors that fit standard play tubes in case you want to connect accessories or additional habitats. This is a user-friendly hamster cage with no tools required for assembly & each Arcade measures 18.1L x 11.4W x 21.5H inches. Every Arcade includes the MidWest Quality Guarantee 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty. If you have any questions about our Hamster Homes our customer service department would be glad to help you, available 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM (EST), Monday - Friday.
feature_bullets: Fun Arcade Hamster Home features a cool multi level play space to watch your hamster in action 18.11Length x 11.4 Width x 21.5 Height Inches, 6.1 Pounds
Hamster Home includes FREE accessories to get you started. Exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook & interior play tubes
Arcade Hamster Home features a deep base to contain hamster bedding, a convenient top door for easy access to your pet & a removable upper cover for easy cleaning
Hamster Home is modular in design & includes connector pieces to fit standard play tubes if you want to connect to another hamster habitat
MidWest Quality Guarantee Hamster Cage includes a 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty & simple assembly with no tools required

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
